name: Spring Hotel Vulcano

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Congratulations to the Vulcano. Ok, there may have been a few 'oldies' but, neither more nor less than life in general. The absence of shaven heads, excessive tattoos and boorish behaviour was a massive +. The food (and choice) was excellent and the attention to detail given to diners by the restaurant staff was impressive. Not for the pie, chips and a pint fraternity unless they plan to enhance their lifestyle. Loved the pool, the quality of the water and the well monitored sunbeds. Put your towel down before 8am (and walk away) and you'll have to collect it from reception...it works well. Highly recommended. Final point for the ladies. Bring your own hairdryer- more heat from a spent match!
reviews.title: First Class-and I'm fussy!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: Having read the reviews on this website prior to my visit I arrived with great expectations.
reviews.title: The Bare Facts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: These were quickly dispelled on my arrival when I was allocated a room on what turned out to be the " smoking floor ". The room and the floor generally stunk of stale tobacco smoke and I naturally refused to stay in it. I asked for a sea-view room but was temporarily housed in a room on the second floor which was overlooked by the rooms in the adjoining hotel and offerred little privacy. Eventually I was given a sea view room on the sixth floor which was comfortable , spacious and had a distant obstructed view of the sea.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: My first impressions of the hotel were that it had a nice lobby but I noticed immediately that it was populated by a number of older men who were not wearing shirts. These individuals, with their swollen, mis-shapen, sweaty bodies were in evidence in the lobby, at the reception area and in the lifts.
reviews.title: Not at all what we expected, bit of a nightmare!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For me I was immediately turned off by this and questioned the reception staff as to why it could not be stopped with notices and words of discouragement from the hotel staff.
reviews.title: ideal holiday hotel in every way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ideal hotel for 50+ the buffet meals are excellent, awesome reception.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: not far from beach and shops. We went 1/2 board as a package deal and had been recommended the hotel by friends.
reviews.title: Great Vulcano

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my partner are just back from 7 days in the Vulcano. Amazing reception area which made me get my camera out as soon as I walked through the door. We had a standard room which was nice and clean. Our balcony got the sun late afternoon so after a long day out and about it was good to come back and sit on the balcony topping up my tan until early evening.
reviews.title: Return to Vulcano

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Then theres the food. Oh my god it was amazing! So much selection. I wished I was staying longer so I couldve sampled everything. The staff were very pleasant and prompt. The only thing I would complain about is the noise in the dinning area as the staff clear away the dishes right next to where you're sitting. By the time you finish your meal your ears are ringing but there is a quieter area on the right side of the dinning room with not so many tables so we tried to get a table there every night.
reviews.title: excellent hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location close to shops and bars. Anyone going there should go to Harrys Bar for cocktails. Bit pricey but so good. There is also a free bus to Siam Park outside the hotel which I would highly recommend.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hotel Vulcano for eleven nights in August. From the time we checked in until departure everything was excellent. Our room looked out over a pedestrian walkway up from the beach. We did think intially it might be nosiy but this was not the case. The room was large and really clean. We had a good sized balcony with two sunloungers as well as table, chairs and parasol. Room was cleaned every day, towels changed daily and sheets changed twice during our stay which was great. Meals were excellent as the scales proved when we got home! There was the usual choices for breakfast plus made to order omlettes which were good. Evening meal was really good, usually about five to six choices for main meal, plus two choices on the grill and the carvery. There was also a vegetarian corner and a huge variety of salads to choose from. Good variety of desserts and ice cream. Don't think we saw the same thing on the menu twice during our eleven night stay. Pool was excellent - whole area was throughly cleaned every night. The hotel was quite quiet during our stay so there was an abundance of sunbeds regardless of what time of day you went to the pool. Pool bar offered good value lunchtime snacks, eg burger and chips etc all priced about four euros. Entertainment staff deserve a special mention - they were really enthusiastic and had a wide variety of different activities on every day to keep you amused when you were not frying in the 38 degree heat. Certificates were handed out at night in the bar to the winners which was a nice touch. The main bar was open all day, happy hour from 6pm till 7pm - two for one which was good. Entertainment at nights was a bit of a hit or a miss but we went out most nights anyway. The surrounding area was good, a couple of modern shopping centres are just down from the hotel. There is a strip of pubs just down from the hotel including a Scottish bar and Irish bar which were both really good. Two euros a pint and plenty of live music. One down side though - absolutely loads of people trying to sell sunglasses, watches and silly toys etc. We ate out one night at Teppanyaki restaurant in the Safari centre just down from the hotel - it was really good, would recommend it. We ventured to Veronicas (the strip) one night, it was okay, typical of what you would expect, loads of touts trying to entice you into their pubs for a free shot. We found the drinks were very expensive here. Had a fantastic holiday at the Hotel Vulcano, anybody booking a holiday here will have a great time. We'll definately be back!!
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: I am a 16 year old girl and I went to the hotel vulcano with my grandparents this year as a treat for completing my GCSEs. I found the hotel staff very friendly and they were never to busy to answer a question or help you do something. There was plenty to do for both old and young people, activities at the hotel were always organised and prizes were won and given out during the entertainment section of the evening. The position of the hotel is fantastic, it is within close walking distance of the beach, shops, bars and restaurants. Definitely one of the best hotels I have experienced, and I know my grandparents felt the same. Will be returning next year.
reviews.title: Fantastic Value, plenty to do for all ages.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a really excellent hotel and I had a fantastic 2 week stay there with my partner in August. We're both 24 and were, as others have been, a little concerned we would be out of place and treated differently to older guests. However, this was absolutely not the case. There were guests of all ages during our stay and we were treated with the same respect and warmth as everyone else by the staff. The staff members were outstanding in all the different areas of the hotel and helped to make the stay all the more enjoyable.
reviews.title: Excellent and highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: It was my partner’s birthday during our stay and when I told reception (thought I might as well!) they arranged for sparkling wine to be sent to our room. It was waiting for us when we got up there and was a lovely surprise for him and a nice touch.
reviews.title: Excellent for all ages.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food and Drink
reviews.title: Most amazing hotel i've ever stayed in :)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived at the hotel on Saturday early afternoon, quick pleasant checkin procedure. Room was being cleaned as we arrived upstairs and was spotless. Two single beds which were extremely comfortable, extra pillows and blankets if needed. English channels on tv a bonus. Bathroom clean and tidy, fresh towels daily. Only problem with room was that at 10.30pm every night til 12.30am one of the bars down the road had music and singing blasting out. Had to wear ear plugs to try to drown the noise out every night.
reviews.title: Perfect position

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food- Breakfast was excellent, everything you could want and the porridge was to die for.
reviews.title: Probably the best of the Spring Hotels...but not THE best in Tenerife.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Evening meal, no problems, plenty of choice.
reviews.title: Brilliant Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pool- lots of sunbeds available ,heated pool lovely.
reviews.title: Brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: Hotel very modern and well presented, staff very pleasant and attentive.
reviews.title: Civilised Holidaying

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After a very quick reception -- "Here is your key, this is your room number "-- we were in our room. Room was OK but no info re hotel, facilities or area. At reception we were told it was going to be replaced and would not be available for a few days. It never materialised and we had to find out for ourselves . This took us the best part of our hols. and info had to be squeezed out of them.
reviews.title: Poor Introduction.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The restaurant was canteenish with food being left uncovered and unused food brought out
reviews.title: Nothing great, nothing awful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: again next day, partic salad meats. Strongly recommend hotel manager (if there is one) to
reviews.title: As good as they say

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: install hand disinfecting bottles at entrance of restaurant.
reviews.title: Hols at Vulcano

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The entertainment was usually quite good and the animacion team kept those who wanted it
reviews.title: Always welcome here!
DON'T TRUST YOUR RESERVATION WITH THE VULCANO!!!!!
reviews.text: Travelled as two couples for a week in Vulcano Hotel. On arrival was informed that there were no rooms for us and that we were being transfered to their sister hotel, not only this the room in the sister hotel would not be ready for a night so had to spend our first night at yet another hotel.

reviews.title: great hotel
reviews.text: The hotel receptionist admitted that there had been overbooking in hope that someone may cancel and make room for us!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: SO CHECK BEFORE YOU GO EVEN IF WITH AN TOUR OPERATOR.
reviews.title: Happy days

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This experience did not effect the standard and quality of the hotel we finally stayed in as it was of a high standard and can only imagine the vulcano would have been the same as it was a sister hotel.
reviews.title: Downhill since last time we stayed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: our first time at the vulcano and had a fantstic holiday,
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is very dear to the hearts of the many guests who return year after year and in some cases several times a year.
reviews.title: Wonderful Vulcano

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What is the secret of its success? It is the unfailing kindness and friendly professionalism of all its staff who love their work and who make each guest feel especially wanted. When you combine this wonderful service with good quality food,
reviews.title: Friendliest large hotel I have ever stayed in
Excellent for the less mobile
reviews.text: great entertainment and a very pleasant building in a good area of Tenerife you have success!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We are already looking forward to our next visit!
reviews.title: A HOTEL DEFINITELY FOR THE ELDERLY

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Superb hotel from the cleanliness, the food, the service and especially the staff. They always make time for a laugh and a joke whilst, at all times, having respect for the guests and providing great service. This was the seventh time we have stayed at the Vulcano and to be honest would not wish to stay anywhere else.
reviews.title: Relaxing Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have been looking at the good reviews of the Vulcano Hotel for a number of years and so glad in the end we bit the bullet and booked. We have just returned after a wonderful week's winter holiday.
reviews.title: Probably one of the best hotels we have stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our standard room was spacious and comfortable and was kept spotlessly clean by our housekeeper and all areas of the hotel were kept in the same condition.
reviews.title: excellent facilty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bathroom was huge and it actually had a magnified mirror in the bathroom so I could see to do my make up. The television in our room included a good number of british stations and also Sky Sport.
reviews.title: Overall Very Good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly and helpful. Danielle one of the ladies in the animaction team was brilliant. There was lots of daytime activities if you wanted it, always aqua aerobics, darts, shooting, etc. My husband and I love to dance and there was dancing every night and entertainment acts every night as well. Some of it might not have been to our taste but mainly it was very good. There were plenty of sunbeds around the pool area and the pool itself was lovely, I swam every day. Luckily the weather was glorious.
reviews.title: just spent a week in tenerife

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Now we come to the food.....it was fantastic, always plenty of it and of a very high standard. There was such a good choice at both breakfast and dinner. The deserts were to die for and I ate far too many of them, good job I was only there for 7 days!!
reviews.title: good getaway

description: Spring Hotel Vulcano is strategically placed in the nicest part of Playa de las Americas. Next to the beach, the best shopping and entertainment area and 1 km from an 18-hole golf course Las Americas.
